text: thanks <@U7ADCU3BM> I had to missed that when I checked documentation :slightly_smiling_face:
Facing issue, When I try to call from HubSpot dialer & select my dialer, it does not look proper, it does not fit in screen. Any idea?

<@U7ADCU3BM> do you know wht some of the button modules are generating weird url when you linking to external or content? Ex.: <https://www.mindlinksoft.com/%7Burl=%7Btype=CONTENT,%20content_id=51870803725,%20href=https://www.mindlinksoft.com/contact-us%7D,%20open_in_new_tab=false,%20no_follow=false,%20sponsored=false,%20user_generated_content=false,%20rel=%7D|https://www.mindlinksoft.com/%7Burl=%7Btype=CONTENT,%20content_id=51870803725,%20href=h[â€¦]sponsored=false,%20user_generated_content=false,%20rel=%7D>
I would say that you are using something like: `{{ module.link_field }}` instead of `{{ module.link_field.href }}`
Thanks for the hint <@U7ADCU3BM> In my case I had to use {{ module.link_field.url.href }}
